channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title: 沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）解除了备受爱戴的乌克兰武装部队司令的职务。重要的是，这一变动造成的混乱不会削弱乌克兰的作战能力👇。
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky has dismissed the much-loved commander of Ukraine’s armed forces. It is important that the disruptions caused by this change do not degrade Ukraine’s capacity to fight econ.st/3UGfOe6 👇

item.title:
美国制定银行规则的过程分为许多阶段。通常技术性很强。
但大型银行的老板们似乎对如何实施《巴塞尔协议 III》的建议耿耿于怀。这足以动摇他们的政治立场吗？ 👇
item.description:
America’s process for creating bank rules has many stages. It is normally pretty technical.

But bosses of large banks seem to have taken proposals on how to implement Basel III personally. Will this prove enough to sway their politics? econ.st/3utxtey 👇

item.title: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 2021 年 1 月 6 日的事件中扮演了重要角色，但科罗拉多州很可能不会被允许将他从选票中删除，其他 49 个州也不会在今年的选举中将他从选票中删除 👇 。
item.description: Despite Donald Trump’s role in the events of January 6th 2021, Colorado will very probably not be allowed to remove him from its ballot, nor will the other 49 states in this year’s election econ.st/3Uw34a9 👇

item.title:
墨西哥总统及其家人否认最近针对他们的一系列指控。
无论如何，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔对腐败的管理令人震惊。
item.description:
Mexico’s president and his family deny a recent slew of allegations against them.

Regardless, Andrés Manuel López Obrador’s management of corruption has been appalling econ.st/3uiENd3 👇

item.title:
对许多人来说，拨打客户服务电话等同于坠入地狱深渊。但有些人却能找到真正的联系。
当这种联系不再是人与人之间的联系时，会发生什么呢？
item.description:
For many, calling a customer-service number equates to diving into the depths of hell. But others find moments of genuine connection.

What happens when that connection stops being human? econ.st/3uhfYhu

item.title: 佐科-维多多帮助印尼成为近年来经济表现最好的国家之一。但这一进步是在即将离任的总统独裁本能的影响下取得的，而他心目中的继任者似乎有可能效仿他的独裁本能。
item.description: Joko Widodo has helped make Indonesia one of the best-performing economies in recent years. But this progress has come about in spite of the outgoing president’s authoritarian instincts, which his preferred successor seems likely to emulate econ.st/42AIJSN 👇

item.title:
学生们每天要参加 14 个小时的讲座、研讨会和社交活动。如果有人不参加，你应该问 "你为什么不参加？"
1843》杂志深入了解嘀嗒拼车的房地产活动
item.description:
Students were expected to attend 14 hours of lectures, seminars and social events each day. If someone wasn’t joining in you were supposed to ask “why aren’t you doing that?”

1843 magazine goes inside the TikTok property hustle econ.st/49dZVjF

item.title: 到 2040 年，非洲所需的建筑中约有 70% 尚未建成。非洲大陆如何才能容纳世界上增长最快的人口？ 👇
item.description: About 70% of buildings needed in Africa by 2040 are not yet built. How can the continent house the world’s fastest-growing population? econ.st/4bozv0h 👇

item.title: 日本主要反对党领导人泉健太渴望变革。执政党现在丑闻缠身，理论上，他有一个难得的机会来实现变革👇。
item.description: Izumi Kenta, the leader of Japan’s main opposition party, is itching for change. With the ruling party now beset by scandal, in theory, he has a rare opportunity to get it econ.st/3SOBe7D 👇

item.title: 美国拥有一支横跨全球的军队，而伊朗仍然依赖于登月前的战舰和战斗机。那么，为什么伊朗如此难以恫吓呢？ 👇
item.description: America has a globe-striding army; Iran still relies on warships and fighter jets that predate the Moon landing. Why, then, is Iran so hard to intimidate? econ.st/49slSvg 👇

item.title: 澳大利亚的移民从来没有引发过民粹主义的大规模反弹：大多数居民都张开双臂欢迎新移民。但现在，他们的容忍度正在经受考验👇。
item.description: Immigration in Australia has never triggered a major populist backlash: most residents have welcomed newcomers with open arms. But now their tolerance is being tested econ.st/3SOARtL 👇

item.title: 三星老板再次躲过牢狱之灾。李在镕无罪释放对他有利，但对韩国未必有利 👇
item.description: Samsung’s boss has avoided prison, again. Lee Jae-yong’s acquittal will benefit him, but not necessarily South Korea econ.st/3SxGdZc 👇

item.title: 历史会欺骗读者。它看起来是关于过去的--到处都是穿着古怪、老式衣服的人。但它往往也是关于现在的👇。
item.description: History plays tricks on the reader. It looks like it is about the past—it is full of people in odd, old-fashioned clothes. But it is often just as much about the present econ.st/485VZQH 👇

item.title: 我们的副主编告诉《The Intelligence》，乌克兰最高将领被解职标志着战争进入了一个新阶段--这也是沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）重塑战争条件的机会。收听播客： 👇
item.description: The sacking of Ukraine’s top general marks a new phase in the war, our deputy editor tells “The Intelligence”—and a chance for Volodymyr Zelensky to reframe its terms. Listen to the podcast: econ.st/3OAELnq 👇

item.title: 11 月，美国人将选出他们的下一任总统。经济学人》正在追踪这场角逐。关注最新民调，阅读关于两位主要候选人的简短指南，并标记关键的选举日历日期👇。
item.description: In November Americans will elect their next president. The Economist is tracking the contest. Follow the latest polls, read short guides on the two main candidates, and mark key electoral-calendar dates econ.st/3Uw0Jfn 👇

item.title: 英国对阿片类药物危机毫无准备。2010 年代的资金削减使药物治疗计划遭受重创。政府承认需要对此类服务进行更多投资。然而，政府必须做的远不止恢复被浪费的资金👇。
item.description: Britain is unprepared for an opioid crisis. Funding cuts in the 2010s have devastated drug-treatment programmes. The government acknowledges more investment in such services is needed. Yet it must do far more than restore what it has squandered econ.st/48gSRSg 👇

item.title: 最高法院暗示将把唐纳德-特朗普保留在今年大选的选票上。大法官们对第 14 修正案第 3 条的裁决甚至可能是一致的👇。
item.description: The Supreme Court has hinted it will keep Donald Trump on the ballot for this year’s election. The justices’ decision on Section 3 of the 14th Amendment might even be unanimous econ.st/3SOCHe9 👇

item.title: 谁是约旦河西岸的定居者--为什么他们的存在导致了数十年的暴力？我们为您解释：
item.description: Who are the settlers in the West Bank—and why has their presence led to decades of violence? We explain: econ.st/4bA7R07

item.title: 英国经济迟早需要降息。通胀正在回落，但对经济增长的担忧正在上升 👇
item.description: Britain’s economy will need rate cuts sooner rather than later. Inflation is coming down but worries about growth are rising econ.st/48bpYqj 👇

item.title: 自去年哈马斯发动袭击以来，乔-拜登一直全力支持以色列。但一项对定居者实施制裁的命令表明，他对本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的强硬派联盟的耐心正在消退👇。
item.description: Joe Biden has backed Israel to the hilt since Ha­mas’s attack last year. But an order imposing sanctions on settlers is a sign that his patience with Binyamin Netanya­hu’s hardline coalition is wearing thin econ.st/49q5efF 👇

item.title: 在电子表格之间跳转。这是管理顾问的爱与性指南 👇
item.description: Jump between the spreadsheets. This is the management consultant’s guide to love and sex econ.st/48cUSyQ 👇

item.title: 大选在即，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andrés Manuel López Obrador）挥金如土。问题是墨西哥付不起总统的账单👇。
item.description: Andrés Manuel López Obrador is splashing out as elections loom. The trouble is Mexico can’t pay the president’s bill econ.st/3UFfVa9 👇

item.title: 印尼希望在 2045 年成为发达经济体，但它面临着 "巨大的挑战"。即使没有大国竞争的阴影笼罩，这些挑战 "也很难应对"。
item.description: Indonesia faces “enormous challenges” to its hope of becoming advanced economy by 2045, says Ganjar Pranowo. They’re “hard enough to tackle, even without great-power competition looming in the background”, writes the presidential candidate in a guest essay econ.st/3HSupeW

item.title: 希望领导世界第三大民主国家的候选人发誓要将增长率提高到 7%。印尼人早已耳熟能详 👇。
item.description: Candidates hoping to lead the world’s third-largest democracy are vowing to raise its growth rate to 7%. Indonesians have heard it all before econ.st/49qZp1A 👇

item.title:
美国大型银行的老板们似乎对拟议中的新资本规则深恶痛绝。
黄金时段的广告警告经济将面临可怕的后果，高管们也毫不掩饰地发出威胁，这些都显示出他们有多么愤怒👇。
item.description:
Bosses of large banks in America seem to have been personally offended by proposed new capital rules.

Prime-time advertisements warning of dire consequences for the economy, and not-at-all-veiled threats from executives, show how just angry they are econ.st/3SpInK4 👇

item.title: 乌克兰地面部队司令奥莱克桑德尔-瑟尔斯基（Oleksandr Syrsky）接替瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）担任总司令。去年，我们对这位现在肩负着国家命运的人进行了报道 👇。
item.description: Oleksandr Syrsky, the head of Ukraine’s ground forces, has replaced Valery Zaluzhny as commander-in-chief. Last year we profiled the man who now has the fate of the country on his shoulders econ.st/49wpdtd 👇

item.title: 美国简讯是我们最新的每日时事通讯，跟踪报道总统竞选以及参议院、众议院和州机构竞选的进展情况。注册后，您将在收件箱中收到最重要的选举新闻综述 ⬇️
item.description: The US in brief, our latest daily newsletter, tracks developments in the presidential race and in contests for the Senate, the House of Representatives and state bodies. Sign up to get a round-up of the most important electoral news in your inbox econ.st/3w8Fy8S ⬇️

item.title: 中国的宣传人员声称，公众希望与台湾统一--而且愿意使用武力来实现这一目标。我们的 "鼓楼 "播客将为您揭示这是否真的是当地的真实想法 👇。
item.description: China’s propagandists claim that the public wants reunification with Taiwan—and is willing to use force to achieve it. Our “Drum Tower” podcast finds out if this is really the mood on the ground econ.st/3upYv6q 👇

item.title:
墨西哥总统正在与腐败指控作斗争。他否认有任何不当行为。
但事实是，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔在解决社会问题方面做得太少👇。
item.description:
Mexico’s president is fighting claims of corruption. He denies any wrongdoing.

But the truth is that Andrés Manuel López Obrador has done too little to tackle the problem in society econ.st/3SBSUSL 👇

item.title: 云技术虽然令人瞩目，但没有理由认为它已接近完成。数据的产生和对数据分析的需求都在不断增长 👇
item.description: Remarkable as the cloud is, there is no reason to think it is anywhere near completion. The generation of data and the need for its analysis continue to grow econ.st/3SmJ1bg 👇
